product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Electric Hot Oil Popcorn Popper, Healthy Snack Maker, 24 Cups, Red (73302)
product_meta.description: Make a favorite movie theater treat at home in just minutes. The Hamilton Beach hot oil popcorn popper is easy to use. Simply add kernels and your choice of oil, plug it in and let the fun begin. Everyone can have their own bowl of popcorn as this Popper makes up to 24 Cups per batch, and the popper lid inverts to become the serving bowl. Customize the flavor by adjusting the seasonings to your liking. The built in butter well lets you melt butter into the freshly popped kernels while popping, or you can have it plain for a healthy snack.
feature_bullets: Hot and delicious popcorn in just minutes
Butter well lets you add flavor while popping
